column3: The first person to find any white object, give out $ sips. Bonus points if you're wearing whitey tighties!
%s, ask a question to the room at large. The first person to answer can give out $ sips
%s, take a sip of your drink and then hum a song. The first person to guess the song correctly can give out $ sips
Each person must drink twice and read their last text message out loud to the room. %s, you start
How much did your shoes cost? Each person, say your choice and then click the screen. %s, you start
The person with the most expensive pair, drink $ times
The person with the cheapest pair, drink $ times
The people with shoes over 60 dollars, drink $ times
%s, say a letter. Everyone keeps adding a letter until a word is made, the person who makes the word drinks $ times
Heads or tails? Each person, say your choice and then click the screen
Tails, drink $ times
Heads, drink $ times
Tails, give out $ sips
Heads, give out $ sips
Decide who is the biggest goofball in the room. He/she will now be called Goofy and drink $ times
Goofy, give out $ sips
Being goofy is awesome, drink one time
Decide who is the best looking person in the room. That person must now drink $ times
Hey good lookin', give out $ sips
The King of Ugly has spoken. The good looking person must drink one more sip
Decide who is the smartest person in the room. That person must now drink $ times
Since alcohol makes you smarter, have one more sip!
Hey smartie pants, give out $ sips
%s, mime a scene from a movie. The first person to guess the correct movie can give out $ sips
Around the room, name someone who must take 2 sips. %s, you start
Black or white? Everyone choose a side and tap the screen for the right answer
The right answer was...grey! Everyone loses! Drink $ times
White! Black team drink $ times
Black! White team drink $ times
Around the room, say one thing you have never done. Everyone who has done it, drink once! %s, you start
Around the room, say one thing you have done. Everyone who has never done it, drink once! %s, you start
Around the room, you have exactly 2 seconds to say a word related to the word said by the previous player. %s choose your word and start! Loser drinks $ times
%s you say In my suitcase
column5: and start by adding one item. Each player repeats the items in the suitcase and adds on one new item. First person to fail

column3: %s, you say Once upon a time..."
column4: and add 3 words max. Around the room
column5: each player repeats the story so far and adds their own 3 words. First person to fail drinks $ times"

column3: Go around the room, do a gesture after repeating the gestures done so far. The loser drinks $ times! %s, you start
Go around the room, you have 1 second to say a word right after the previous one that could build a correct sentence. The loser drinks $ times, %s starts!
Go around the room, spell the last name of the person to your right. Those who fail drink $ times, %s you start!
Go around the room, spell the first name of the person to your right. Those who fail drink $ times, %s you start!
Go around the room and tell us the last movie you watched. Those who watched the same movie, drink $ times together
Truth or dare? Go around the room, play with the neighbor to your right, $ sips if someone refuses. %s starts
Each player can give out as many sips as they have first names. %s, you start
Go around the room, repeat five times in a row: Three grey geese in a green field grazing" in less than 6 seconds. $ sips for the winners. $ sips to for the losers. %s starts"
%s, choose a word. First person to sing a song with this word, gives out $ sips
%s, drink $ sips. The neighbor to your right drinks one less, until reaching 0
%s, tells the first name and age of each player. The person whose name or age you screw up can give out $ sips
Art time! We draw a little penis on the fridge except %s, who'll decide which is the cutest. Big winner will give out $ sips!
%s, say a I once...". You can lie. Players
column4: say in turn if you think it's true or false. In the end

column3: Rock-paper-scissors round! Everyone play in turn against the neighbor to their left in one round. Each time, big winner gives out 2 sips, the other drinks... %s starts

Find what's next! %s starts singing a song, point to a player anytime to let him/her continue with the right lyrics. The player sings and goes on with another player, until someone fails and drinks $ times
